name: Chickpea Pumpkin Veggie Pizza
description: Chickpea Pumpkin Veggie Pizza with Basic Pizza crust. Pumpkin sauce spiced with herbs and spices, topped with spicy chickpeas, veggies and pepita parmesan. Vegan Pizza Recipe Makes 1 medium to large pizza. 5 main ingredients – Pumpkin puree + herbs, Chickpeas + spice mix, pizza crust (storebought or homemade), veggies (optional), vegan parm or cheese.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup pumpkin puree (not pumpkin pie mix, or roasted butternut puree or other winter squash puree)
1 tsp italian herb blend or oregano + thyme + sage
a generous sprinkle of black pepper to taste
1/3  or more salt (depending on if the chickpeas were salted)
pepita parmesan (or your favorite parm recipe)
Pizza dough - use this White garlic Crust (or any of my other pizza crusts)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F / 220ºc. Prep the Pizza dough according to instruction. Roll it out into a 12 to 13 inch pizza. Let the rolled out dough sit near the warming oven for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F / 220ºc. Prep the Pizza dough according to instruction. Roll it out into a 12 to 13 inch pizza. Let the rolled out dough sit near the warming oven for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the pumpkin sauce: Mix everything in a bowl until well combined. Add more salt if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the pumpkin sauce: Mix everything in a bowl until well combined. Add more salt if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients under chickpeas until well combined and all chickpeas are covered in spice.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the ingredients under chickpeas until well combined and all chickpeas are covered in spice.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the pumpkin sauce over the rolled out dough evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the pumpkin sauce over the rolled out dough evenly.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a layer of sliced tomatoes, then sliced onions, and other veggies like zucchini or mushrooms if using.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a layer of sliced tomatoes, then sliced onions, and other veggies like zucchini or mushrooms if using.

recipeInstructions.text: Add spiced chickpeas all over. Sprinkle salt and pepper. Bake for 16 to 17 minutes. Broil for a minute to brown if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add spiced chickpeas all over. Sprinkle salt and pepper. Bake for 16 to 17 minutes. Broil for a minute to brown if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the pizza from the oven. Add chopped fresh basil or other herbs on top. Sprinkle vegan parmesan. Let it sit for a minute, the slice and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the pizza from the oven. Add chopped fresh basil or other herbs on top. Sprinkle vegan parmesan. Let it sit for a minute, the slice and serve.
